about_the_game:
Note:

This game was created using the MAKER MZ RPG. Please note the following features.

The mouse only works in the start menu and in battles. In game mode, only the keyboard is functional for a better experience of what the game has to offer.

And to activate full screen mode, use "F4".

The Heflitian Girl's past is about to be unraveled!

It's not just a story; it's a mirror of the soul. At every step, you'll find yourself immersed in the delicate nuances of the Heflitian girl's emotions; Sutelz Selz - the joys that warm the heart and the pains that leave their mark.

Explore the feelings of loss, longing and hope, while building deep bonds that echo far beyond the game. Experience what will stay with you long after the end credits.

Exciting battles with simple functions and strategies

Battle voice

WARNING: This game contains swear words.

  • ▶ The game contains 7 missions with 2 characters, Henry and Orion

  • ▶ Deep story and metaphors regarding the world, life itself, and mental health

  • ▶ Unique storytelling style along with 2D graphics and iconic music

  • ▶ Main and secondary characters are captivating and unique

  • ▶ Features a variety of diversions for the player, involving an amusement park, farm area, and totally free shopping choices that directly influence gameplay

  • ▶ Dubbing for battle mode, pre-battle, and also in specific scenes

On another planet that is not Earth, there are two species that coexist. Humans and Heflites.

Heflites, unlike humans, only live for 20 years, but the girl still trapped in the psychological and emotional pressure of the day is 17 years old and will soon die too...

Sutelz Selz is the girl who was kidnapped as a child, and now needs to obey a man's orders...But in exchange he will give her a second chance to live...

The friendship necessary for any Human or Heflite is formed in a hurry...

Days of battle without knowing if you will be able to return home alive...

Obtaining freedom, wishes, desires...

Everything, she will experience...

In Kimi sae Ireba - Episode Sutelz, follow the protagonist's journey in an emotional story that portrays her life from ages 17 to 19. Dive into emotional challenges, explore beautifully designed environments, and face strategic battles that complement a deep narrative about friendship and sacrifice.

But when everything falls apart, she chooses solitude as the only way to cope with the scars left behind and days of work imposed against her will. Kimi sae Ireba - Episode Sutelz invites you to experience this unforgettable journey.

◆Team/Cast

＜Story/Script/Game Design/Setting＞

Lucas Vacari Gomes

＜Illustrator＞

Krato Naka, Lucas Vacari Gomes

＜Logo Design＞

Harsha

＜Composer/Lyricist＞

Lucas Vacari Gomes

＜Voice＞

Sutelz Selz - Ishizaki Miho

＜Plugins and their creators＞

LL_GalgePauseSign - ルルの教会

LJJ_skipPartCommand - Accendor

Ritter_TittleMovie Ritter - Ritter

Ritter_Loading Screen - Ritter

Multi-Layer HP Gauge - VisuStella

WeakenessPopups - VisuStella

VisuMZ_0_CoreEngine - VisuStella

VisuMZ_1_BattleCore - VisuStella

VisuMZ_3_VisualCutinEffect - VisuStella

TorigoyaMZ_FrameTween - Rutan(ru_shalm)

TorigoyaMZ_SkillCutIn - Rutan(ru_shalm)

＜Materials:＞

Material 1:Amusement park! Tile set

(C)WataruNakanami

Material 2: TIME FANTASY: ANIMALS

(C) finalbossblues

Material 3: Future Fantasy

(C) finalbossblues

＜Translator＞

English:

Douglas Almeida - @designdouglas

Japanese:

Lucas Vacari Gomes

＜SFX Cooperation＞

Pond5

highlighted.name: Last tears left by the one who changed me...
A void left by the one who created her.
Henry's search is over, but I'm still lost...
A gift received from someone I least expected

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.4GHz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280ｘ720 *VRAM:256MB or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 830 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.4GHz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280ｘ720 *VRAM:256MB or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 830 MB available space

short_description: The Heflitian Girl's past is about to be revealed! This is a Drama and Action Adventure with a deep story and mysteries originating from an ancient planet... Planet Earth, which was destroyed and forgotten...
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
